attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: im doing this petition because i suffer with medical problems and my fiance is in prison and i have to wait for my operation till my partner gets out and we have been told that he may not be able to get tag because he was sentences for gbh and if he dont get tag we will have to wait till april 2010! where if he gets tag he will be out in november 09 and i can have my opertion and i will no longer have to suffer in pain ! and i think my partner should get tag just like the rest so he can be home and helping me

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
